definitions.definition: An image , symbol , picture , portrait , or other representation usually as an object of religious devotion.
A type of religious painting portraying a saint or scene from Scripture , often done on wooden panels.
A person or thing that is the best example of a certain profession or some doing.
examples: That man is an icon in the business; he personifies loyalty and good business sense.

definitions.definition: A small picture that represents something.
examples: Click the loudspeaker icon to configure audio settings.

subdefinitions.definition: An image used to represent a user; an avatar or profile picture .
examples: Is it okay if I use your drawing as my icon ?

definitions.definition: A word, character, or sign whose form reflects and is determined by the referent ; onomatopoeic words are necessarily all icons.

main_definition: An image , symbol , picture , portrait , or other representation usually as an object of religious devotion.
secondary_definitions: ( religion , especially Eastern Christianity ) A type of religious painting portraying a saint or scene from Scripture , often done on wooden panels.
( by extension ) A person or thing that is the best example of a certain profession or some doing.
( graphical user interface ) A small picture that represents something.
( linguistics , semiotics ) A word, character, or sign whose form reflects and is determined by the referent ; onomatopoeic words are necessarily all icons.
